name: f1multiviewer
description: F1TV Multi-Screen Viewer for macOS, Windows and Linux

scripts.make:all: yarn make:mac && yarn make:win && yarn make:linux
scripts.publish:all: yarn publish:mac && yarn publish:win && yarn publish:linux
scripts.sign: python -m castlabs_evs.vmp sign-pkg out/F1\ MultiViewer-darwin-arm64 && python -m castlabs_evs.vmp sign-pkg out/F1\ MultiViewer-darwin-x64 && python -m castlabs_evs.vmp sign-pkg out/F1\ MultiViewer-win32-x64
scripts.postinstall: python3 -m pip install --upgrade castlabs-evs && python3 -m castlabs_evs.vmp sign-pkg node_modules/electron/dist
